combat1.name: Normal Attack: Lightning Touch
combat1.info:
**Normal Attack**
Perform up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG.

**Charged Attack**
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time.

**Plunging Attack**
Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

combat2.name: Violet Arc
combat2.info:
Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away.

**Press**
Releases a homing Lightning Orb.
On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of the Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to enemies in a small AoE.

**Hold**
After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby enemies.
Deals great amounts of extra damage to enemies based on the number of Shock stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.
combat2.description: Electro Purple is the raiment of the Witch of Purple Rose.

combat3.name: Lightning Rose
combat3.info:
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding enemies and dealing Electro DMG.
The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back enemies and deal Electro DMG for so long as it persists.
combat3.description: This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.

passive1.name: Induced Aftershock
passive1.info: Hits by charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Shocked status to enemies.

passive2.name: Static Electricity Field
passive2.info: Enemies hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

passive3.name: General Pharmaceutics
passive3.info: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.
